description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Khao Lak, Thailand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Khao Lak Beachfront Indulgence with All-Inclusive Dining, Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks & Massages
hotels.description: Some experiences in life shouldn't be missed. Place an all-inclusive stay at this lavish five-star resort at the top of your travel to-do list. Perfectly positioned facing the cool blue waters of the Andaman Sea, this beachfront haven caters to your every whim. While there's plenty to discover beyond the hotel, this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and enjoy, providing both relaxation and excitement for the entire family. Savour a fusion of flavours at Plai Dining Room and Kram Beach Club, plunge into one of two aquamarine pools, or visit the serene Rosalyn Spa for a heavenly treatment. Little ones can race through the twin-looped waterslide or make friends at the onsite kids' club while parents sip on a refreshing cocktail at Tharn Pool Bar. While the top-notch facilities make it difficult to tear yourself away from the serenity of the resort, the surrounding wonders reward those who choose to explore. For eager snorkelers or beach lovers, the gorgeous Similan and Surin Islands are a must-visit. For history enthusiasts, Takua Pa Old Town is a short drive away.

hotels.vendor_name: The Waters Khao Lak by Katathani Collection
hotels.title: Thailand Luxury: Khao Lak Oasis with Direct Pool Access & Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Cocktails
hotels.description: Enter a world of cascading waterfalls, turquoise pools and golden sands at this tranquil resort. Located in Thailand’s breathtaking Khao Lak region, this lavish hideaway boasts more than 3,000 square metres of water across seven pools, each flanked by swaying palm trees. With a guaranteed upgrade to the resort's Water Wing Pool category, every room enjoys easy or direct pool access. Relax with a sleep-in before enjoying breakfast at Amici Italian Bistro. Then, spend the afternoon sipping cocktails at the swim-up Bubble Bar, rejuvenating at the onsite Sala Massage or keeping little ones entertained at the resort's dedicated games room and tech hub. For even more adventure, explore the Water Zone and Sands Castle Kids' Club at the nearby sister property, The Sands Khao Lak, with complimentary entry and shuttle transfers included. With just a five-minute walk down to the beach, the world truly is your oyster at this coastal paradise.

hotels.title: Khao Lak Five-Star Oceanfront Escape with Onsite Waterpark
hotels.description: Wake up to the turquoise horizon of Thailand's Andaman Sea from the five-star Avani+ Khao Lak Resort, a jewel in Khao Lak's crown. Resting on its own stretch of gleaming white beach, enjoy a tropical oceanfront escape at this 284-room resort that's equally perfect as a family holiday or romantic rendezvous. Swim in the four pristine swimming pools, keep the kids entertained at the fun-filled kids' club and waterpark, and feast on everything from woodfired pizzas and international bites at any of the five restaurants.

hotels.vendor_name: The Leaf on The Sands by Katathani Resort
hotels.title: Tropical Khao Lak Oasis Steps from Nang Thong Beach
hotels.description: Calling all nature lovers - retreat to The Leaf on The Sands, a tropical oasis a mere five-minute walk from the powder-soft sands of Nang Thong Beach and its exciting restaurants and bars. Nestled amid viridescent tropical flora, you'll find a sparkling outdoor pool where you can sip your favourite tipple as you lounge in the sun. Then, amble to the onsite Al Dente Italian Bistro and savour hearty woodfired pizzas and perfectly cooked al dente pasta.

hotels.vendor_name: The Leaf Oceanside by Katathani Resort
hotels.title: Khao Lak Tropical Gem near Nang Thong Beach with Lush Gardens & Two Swimming Pools
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a dreamy tropical escape, just moments from the beach, with a stay at The Leaf Oceanside. Hidden among the palms you will discover a luxurious oasis of lush green gardens, a tranquil day spa and the thriving Orchid Restaurant serving exquisite Thai and hearty international meals. Spend leisurely days lounging by the two sparkling swimming pools and, as night falls, stay poolside and enjoy a refreshing cocktail.

hotels.vendor_name: The Sands by Katathani  Khao Lak
hotels.title: Bestselling Khao Lak Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Cocktail & Late Checkout
hotels.description: Sat amid a lush, forested headland and flowing onto the dazzling sands of Nang Thong Beach, The Sands Khao Lak by Katathani is your tranquil and secluded escape, located just minutes from the town’s main shopping strip and an hour from vibrant Phuket. Unwind across two pools, satiate any craving at your choice of three restaurants, sip crisp, cold beer and cocktails at four separate bars, and indulge at The Spa, which will coax you with warm sea breezes and the scent of exotic flowers.

hotels.title: Five-Star Pullman Khao Lak Beachfront Escape with Onsite Beach Club & Day Spa
hotels.description: Place a beachfront stay at Pullman Khao Lak Resort at the top of your travel to-do list - perfectly positioned facing the cool blue waters of the Andaman Sea, this resort will cater to your every whim in true Pullman style. While there's plenty to discover beyond the hotel, this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and enjoy, providing both relaxation and excitement for the entire family. Savour a fusion of flavours at Plai Dining Room and Kram Beach Club, plunge into one of two aquamarine pools, visit the serene Rosalyn Spa or raise your heart rate at the 24-hour Pullman Fit centre.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Khao Lak Beachfront Resort with Two Pools & Dining Venues
hotels.description: Experience a pristine hideaway ensconced in tropical gardens on Thailand's tranquil southwest coast. Enjoy an invigorating swim in the beachfront swimming pool, spoil yourself at the indulgent Pran Spa, or dine on Thai favourites at one of the two innovative onsite restaurants, Patio and Green Mango. Spend an afternoon sipping tropical cocktails at Soak Pool Bar, while the kids are entertained at the complimentary Manta Ray Kids' Corner before enjoying a stroll along the white-sand beach, located just moments away from the resort.

hotels.vendor_name: Devasom Khao Lak Beach Resort & Villas
hotels.title: Khao Lak Boutique Luxury with Beachfront Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Discover the natural beauty of Thailand with a stay at the stunning Devasom Khao Lak, nestled between a natural lagoon and one of the country's most stunning sunset beaches. This small luxury property offers direct access to the flawless white sands of a private beach, framed by gently swaying palms. Savour the flavours of Thai-western fusion at the oceanfront Takola Thai Restaurant - featured in the Michelin Guide for 2025 - or for a more relaxed dining experience, head to Devasom Beach Grill and Bar, where you can dine alfresco on seafood as you watch the sun go down. Unwind at the onsite wellness centre, which offers Muay Thai classes, morning yoga, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a serene spa. You can make the most of your Khao Lak experience by treating yourself to a Thai cooking class, an oceanfront cocktail party, a Thai garland-making class or by taking the guided spice tour of the property. Travelling with family? Let little ones run free at the kids' club or invite the whole family to the party with a beach picnic experience.

hotels.title: Romantic Khao Lak Beachfront Retreat with Ocean-View Infinity Pool
hotels.description: On a flawless white-sand beach overlooking aqua waters in Khao Lak, you'll find the perfect couple's retreat, Bangsak Village Khao Lak. With no children under 12 years allowed, absolute tranquility is assured. Each room is decorated in warm hues and soaked in natural light, with touches of Thai-inspired décor, and offers a welcome refuge after a day of exploring. Head to the beachfront Kala Spa for a restorative massage, then dine at the terrace-style Rim Lae Bangsak Restaurant, which serves mouth-watering Thai and international dishes. There's also an infinity pool with an integrated jacuzzi and ocean views, where you can bask in the tropical ambience - you’ll never want to leave.

seo.title: Hôtels à Khao Lak - Thaïlande Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Khao Lak, Thailand avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
